about_the_game:
This dlc contains a total of 110 artistic photos in the game in PNG format, which are very suitable for use as desktop backgrounds
The resolutions are all high-definition pictures above 1400*2100


The file is in the game directory

This material is not commercially available

content_descriptors.notes:
Gaming women are too sexy and may not be suitable for work
All characters are over 18 years old.
